9Mbps max?
In LV, yes. Upgrades are available in MTL for the following one-time fees:
10Mbps - $1
20Mbps - $2
30Mbps - $3
40Mbps - $4
50Mbps - $5
60Mbps - $6
70Mbps - $7
80Mbps - $8
90Mbps - $9
100Mbps - $10

Specs?
E5-1620, E5-1650, X3470 & E3-1230 processors with SATA HDD. RAID 1 in MTL, no RAID in LV. SolusVM and lots of OS to choose from.

DDoS protection?
OVH's anti-DDoS mitigation and Fiberhub's basic protection (10Gbps / 2Mpps).

Unmetered?
No overage fees, but your vps will be suspended upon reaching its limit (e.g. 9Mbps = ~3TB / month).

Can I pay monthly?
Yep, it's $3.33 per month for every plan.

Daily backups?
May be enabled for a $1 one-time fee.

Extra IPs?
IPv4 go for $9 / IP / year or $1 / month. IPv6 = free.

What do you mean by 'unmanaged'?
I mean vps/containers aren't entered into without your consent and support isn't provided re: software errors/configuration/bugs/etc. At the same time there are multiple techs standing by and I'm often willing to attempt 'best effort' support.

Is X allowed?
See the Terms.

Test IP/files?
MTL: 192.99.214.79
LV: 72.46.130.53

Gateways?
PayPal, BitPay and Stripe are accepted with a 7 day money back guarantee.

Further inquiries?
PM or sales@ellipsisno.de. Thanks for your interest.
